name: Factory Reset (Jelleh, Jordan E. Bryan, Elliot Aubrey)
name_original: Factory Reset (Jelleh, Jordan E. Bryan, Elliot Aubrey)
description:
Note: This game was made for the GJL2021 - Summer Game Jam, with a team of 3 people. The theme was "One Time Use".

Explore a seemingly abandoned factory as a repair bot sent out to fix the main generators, finding puzzles and security systems along the way.

Team

  • Elliot Aubrey - Programmer  || Links:
  • Jordan E. Bryan - Composer & Sound Designer || Links: Portfolio
  • Jemma Gilbert - 2D Artist & Level Designer || Links: Portfolio Twitter

We are aware of bugs! We will do our best to try and fix them in the updated build.
